document.full_text: a 12-year-old schoolboy was arrested for a possible hate crime after he attacked a muslim student and attempted to tear off her religious headscarf at school in new york, authorities said on thursday.
document.title: new york boy, 12, arrested for attack on muslim female classmate
lines_and_colors: a 12-year-old schoolboy was arrested for a possible hate crime after he attacked a muslim student and attempted to tear off her religious headscarf at school in new york, authorities said on thursday.
